FuncDef: This command enables the context to enter match criteria for the filter entry. When the match criteria have been satisfied the action associated with the match criteria is executed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 next header to match. This parameter is analogous to the protocol parameter used in IPv4 filter match command. Values-[1 to 42 | 45 to 49 | 52 to 59 | 61 to 255] - in decimal format. Values can also be specified in hexadecimal format, in binary format, or using the following keywords:.
